translation.en: [woman] There is no city on God's green earth that rocks harder than Chicago, Illinois.
translation.zh: 在上帝的绿色地球上 没有城市比芝加哥的伊利诺伊州还棒

translation.en: The legends from this city are so badass,
translation.zh: 这个城市的传奇人物太厉害了

translation.en: they only need one name:
translation.zh: 他们只需要一个名字

translation.en: Oprah, Ditka, Bozo.
translation.zh: 奥普拉、迪特卡、小丑

translation.en: And me, Diane.
translation.zh: 还有我 黛安

translation.en: You know how they call Chicago the city of broad shoulders?
translation.zh: 你知道他们为什么称芝加哥为宽肩之城吗？

translation.en: Well, I'm the broad.
translation.zh: 我就是宽肩女人

translation.en: Just like me, this city has been through some shit,
translation.zh: 就像我一样这座城市经历了一些糟糕的事

translation.en: but it always finds a way to bounce back, baby.
translation.zh: 但总会有办法恢复过来的 宝贝

translation.en: Like in 1871,
translation.zh: 就像在1871年

translation.en: when the whole damn place burned to the ground.
translation.zh: 整个地方都被烧成了平地

translation.en: We didn't cry about it.
translation.zh: 我们没有为此哭泣

translation.en: We built that bitch right back up.
translation.zh: 我们又重新把这里造了出来

translation.en: Then there was Prohibition.
translation.zh: 然后又出现了禁酒令

translation.en: When the country said you can't drink,
translation.zh: 当国家说你不能喝酒时

translation.en: we said, "Eff dat. Make it a double."
translation.zh: 我们说：“去你妈的 给我来双份的”

translation.en: 'Cause in Chicago… [gulps]
translation.zh: 因为在芝加哥

translation.en: …we do things big, baby.
translation.zh: 我们喜欢把事情搞大 宝贝

translation.en: In fact, Chicago does things so big,
translation.zh: 事实上 芝加哥喜欢把事情搞得很大

translation.en: our parties are whole frickin' neighborhoods,
translation.zh: 我们的派对都是整个社区

translation.en: and I live in the best one: Wrigleyville.
translation.zh: 我住在最好的一个社区：莱格里维尔

translation.en: Where you can let your hair down,
translation.zh: 在那里你可以放松下来

translation.en: and when you gotta yak,
translation.zh: 当你要吐的时候

translation.en: there's always someone to hold it back for ya.
translation.zh: 总有人为你把头发挽在后面

translation.en: Me! And I'm gonna party my tits off!
translation.zh: 我！我要去狂欢了！

translation.en: [people chanting] Diane! Diane!
translation.zh: 黛安！

translation.en: Diane! Diane!
translation.zh: 黛安！

translation.en: -[man] Diane! Diane! -Diane! Diane!
translation.zh: -黛安！-黛安！

translation.en: [man] Diane! Diane!
translation.zh: 黛安！

translation.en: -[Diane snores] -Wake up!
translation.zh: 醒醒！

translation.en: [yelps] Damn it, Kurt, you woke me up mid-party dream.
translation.zh: 靠 库尔特 你把我从派对梦中吵醒了

translation.en: That's dangerous.
translation.zh: 太危险了

translation.en: Jesus, Di. I don't know what you got into last night,
translation.zh: 天啊 黛我不知道你昨晚惹了什么麻烦

translation.en: but you came home and drank the bottle of brandy
translation.zh: 但你回家后喝了我爸爸在诺曼底登陆那天

translation.en: my dad had with him on D-Day.
translation.zh: 他带在身上的那瓶白兰地

translation.en: Then you forgot to close the window after you had a smoke,
translation.zh: 然后你抽完烟忘了关窗户

translation.en: and Butkus almost fell out.
translation.zh: 布特库斯差点摔下去

translation.en: You're not even supposed to have that as a pet.
translation.zh: 你根本不应该把这个当宠物养

translation.en: He was in the Reptile Lost and Found.
translation.zh: 它当时就在爬行动物的失物招领处

translation.en: Poor guy had 18 condoms of heroin in his little belly.
translation.zh: 这小可怜的肚子里有18个海洛因套

translation.en: Big whoop, we've all been to Mexico.
translation.zh: 所以呢 我们都去过墨西哥

translation.en: Why are you so angry today? You havin' a 'roid flare-up?
translation.zh: 你今天为什么这么生气？是你的类固醇激升了吗？

translation.en: Diane, yesterday was our anniversary.
translation.zh: 黛安 昨天是我们的结婚纪念日

translation.en: Uh, no doy.
translation.zh: 当然了

translation.en: That's why I got you…
translation.zh: 这就是为什么我给你带了…

translation.en: Al's Beef!
translation.zh: 艾尔牛肉三明治

translation.en: You ate it all.
translation.zh: 你都吃光了

translation.en: There's a couple of fries in the bag.
translation.zh: 袋子里还有几根薯条

translation.en: I don't want bag fries.
translation.zh: 我不想吃袋子里的薯条

translation.en: I want my wife to remember the anniversary of the second time we got married.
translation.zh: 我想让我妻子记得我们第二次结婚的周年纪念日

translation.en: Diane, I'm getting too old to live like this.
translation.zh: 黛安 我太老了 不能这样生活了

translation.en: Based on my family history and cholesterol level,
translation.zh: 根据我的家族史和胆固醇水平

translation.en: I'm gonna die five years ago.
translation.zh: 我五年前就要死了

translation.en: Come on, Kurt, we do this all the time.
translation.zh: 拜托 库尔特 我们经常这样做

translation.en: You get mad, say you're gonna leave,
translation.zh: 你生气了 说你要离开

translation.en: then we angry 69, and it's all good.
translation.zh: 然后我们愤怒地用69式上床就一切都好了

translation.en: So let's unpack that duffel, grab some wet wipes, and--
translation.zh: 那我们就打开行李袋拿些湿纸巾 然后…

translation.en: Not this time. I'm done.
translation.zh: 这次不行 我受够了

translation.en: This isn't Jordan leaving in '93.
translation.zh: 这次不像是乔丹在1993年离开那样

translation.en: It's Jordan leaving in '98.
translation.zh: 这次是乔丹在1998年的离开

translation.en: Good luck doing better than this!
translation.zh: 祝你以后更好！

translation.en: [Diane] Gettin' dumped is the worst way to start off a Monday.
translation.zh: 被甩是开始星期一最糟糕的方式

translation.en: Monday? Oh shit, it's Tuesday.
translation.zh: 星期一？靠 今天是星期二

translation.en: It's my nephew's birthday.
translation.zh: 今天是我侄子的生日

translation.en: Happy birthday, sweetie. Whassup?
translation.zh: 生日快乐 宝贝 你好吗？

translation.en: -Hi, Aunt Diane. -Say it.
translation.zh: -嗨 黛安阿姨-说吧

translation.en: -I can't talk. -Say it.
translation.zh: -我不能说-说吧

translation.en: Whassup?
translation.zh: 你好吗？

translation.en: You're finally 18!
translation.zh: 你终于18岁了！

translation.en: You know what I was doing when I was 18?
translation.zh: 你知道我18岁的时候在干什么吗？

translation.en: Jim Belushi. Ugh.
translation.zh: 吉姆·贝鲁西

translation.en: Played his goddamn harmonica the whole time.
translation.zh: 一直在吹他那该死的口琴

translation.en: Aunt Diane, I can't really talk--
translation.zh: 黛安阿姨 我真的不能说…

translation.en: Hey, no phones during dodgeball.
translation.zh: 喂 玩儿躲避球的时候不能接电话

translation.en: Can I pick the janitor?
translation.zh: 我可以挑选看门人吗？

translation.en: No, you gotta pick Daniel.
translation.zh: 不行 你必须选择丹尼尔

translation.en: Thank you, Barack Obama.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 巴拉克·奥巴马

translation.en: Okay, love you, sweetie.
translation.zh: 好吧 爱你 宝贝

translation.en: What the hell?
translation.zh: 什么情况？

translation.en: -[bell jingles] -Hey, where's Stavros?
translation.zh: 喂 斯塔夫罗斯在哪儿？

translation.en: I beg your pardon?
translation.zh: 你说什么？

translation.en: Stavros.
translation.zh: 斯塔夫罗斯

translation.en: Little Greek guy, unibrow, owns the coffee place next door.
translation.zh: 希腊人、小个子、一字眉隔壁咖啡店的老板

translation.en: Oh, we just bought that building.
translation.zh: 我们刚刚买下了那栋楼

translation.en: Kreativ Jus is expanding.
translation.zh: 创意果汁在扩建

translation.en: By the way, I'm Feather, one of the wellness collaborators.
translation.zh: 顺便说一下 我是费瑟健康合作伙伴之一

translation.en: Yeah, hi. Where's your alkaline water?
translation.zh: 好吧 嗨 你这里的碱水呢？

translation.en: By the chia seeds.
translation.zh: 在奇亚籽旁边

translation.en: If you hit the celery milk, you've gone too far.
translation.zh: 如果你碰到了芹菜牛奶那你就走得太远了

translation.en: [chuckles] You know what I drink, sweetie?
translation.zh: 你知道我喝什么吗 亲爱的？

translation.en: Hose water, straight from Lake Michigan.
translation.zh: 水管的水 直接从密歇根湖流出来的

translation.en: Lake Michigan has extremely high levels of E. coli.
translation.zh: 密歇根湖的大肠杆菌含量极高

translation.en: Don't be afraid of a little diarrhea, honey.
translation.zh: 别怕拉肚子 亲爱的

translation.en: Keeps you slim. Not that you gotta worry about it.
translation.zh: 让你保持苗条 这样你就不用担心了

translation.en: Sweet Christ, you are tight.
translation.zh: 天啊 你体形真好

translation.en: Anyhoo, Feather,
translation.zh: 随便吧 费瑟

translation.en: give me an extra-large half coffee, half cream, half Splendas
translation.zh: 给我一大杯 一半咖啡一半奶油、一半代糖

translation.en: with crushed-up Excedrin on the rim.
translation.zh: 边上放些碎的止痛药

translation.en: It sounds like you're worried about inflammation.
translation.zh: 听起来你很担心发炎

translation.en: Can I interest you in a CBD latte?
translation.zh: 我能推荐你一杯新中央商务区拿铁吗？

translation.en: Reefer that don't get you high? Go scratch.
translation.zh: 不会让你嗨起来的大麻吗？我还是走吧

translation.en: Girls, stop what you're doin'.
translation.zh: 姑娘 停下你们正在做的事

translation.en: I need a Diane day. Kurt left me.
translation.zh: 我需要黛安的一天 库尔特离开了我

translation.en: No. The day after y'all anniversary?
translation.zh: 不是吧 在结婚纪念日的第二天？

translation.en: I know. What a jagbag.
translation.zh: 我知道 真是个混蛋

translation.en: Don't you do the mutual oral sex?
translation.zh: 你们没有互相口交吗？

translation.en: -And then the fight is over, right? -Like I didn't try that, Zuzana.
translation.zh: -然后争吵就结束了 对吧？-就好像我没试过一样 苏珊娜

translation.en: I'm canceling all my appointment.
translation.zh: 我要取消所有的预约

translation.en: Tina, get out your tarot cards. I need a reading.
translation.zh: 蒂娜 拿出你的塔罗牌我需要一个读数

translation.en: Zuzs, take off your Crocs. You're walkin' on my back.
translation.zh: 苏珊 脱掉你的卡骆驰鞋你踩在我背上了

translation.en: Anyway, we got a score?
translation.zh: 不管怎么样 有分数了吗？

translation.en: -[static] -Oh shit, cable's out.
translation.zh: 靠 电线被拔了

translation.en: Zuzana, keep your Crocs on. You're goin' to the roof.
translation.zh: 苏珊娜 穿上你的卡骆驰鞋你要爬上去弄一下

translation.en: Diane, Diane, the new manager said no more Cubs games at work.
translation.zh: 黛安 新来的经理说上班不能再看熊队比赛了

translation.en: Oh, the new manager.
translation.zh: 新来的经理

translation.en: You mean Mr. Fancy Pants from New York,
translation.zh: 你是说纽约来的时尚先生

translation.en: with his skinny little pizzas and his big, fat bagels?
translation.zh: 带着他那瘦削的小披萨和又肥又大的百吉饼？

translation.en: Well, when New Dork Shitty gets here,
translation.zh: 等纽约屌丝来了

translation.en: I'm gonna remind him that this is Chi City Sports Cuts and Clips.
translation.zh: 我要提醒他这里是芝加哥城体育洗剪吹

translation.en: We were built on Chicago sports and the haircuts that defined 'em.
translation.zh: 我们是建立在芝加哥的体育和定义了体育的发型上

translation.en: And in this place, on that screen,
translation.zh: 在这个地方 在那个屏幕上

translation.en: when the Cubs are playin',
translation.zh: 当熊队在比赛的时候

translation.en: we watch 'em fuckin' play.
translation.zh: 我们要看着他们比赛

translation.en: Diane, Gideon, our new manager.
translation.zh: 黛安 这是吉迪恩 我们的新经理

translation.en: Just got in from, how did you put it, New Dork Shitty?
translation.zh: 刚刚进来 你怎么说的来着纽约屌丝？

translation.en: Anyhoo, let's open up.
translation.zh: 随便吧 我们开始工作吧

translation.en: We did, 45 minutes ago.
translation.zh: 我们已经开始45分钟了

translation.en: Great. What'd I miss?
translation.zh: 很好 我错过了什么？

translation.en: Well, I was telling Tina and Zuzana about the big renovation.
translation.zh: 我在跟蒂娜和苏珊娜说大翻修的事

translation.en: All these chairs? Gone.
translation.zh: 所有这些椅子？撤走

translation.en: The TVs will be showing silent music videos,
translation.zh: 电视将播放无声音乐视频

translation.en: and we'll be going cashless.
translation.zh: 我们将不用现金

translation.en: Okay, but just keep in mind,
translation.zh: 好吧 但要记住

translation.en: we're pretty old school at Chi City Sports Cuts and Clips--
translation.zh: 我们是芝加哥城体育洗剪吹是比较老式的…

translation.en: -Borough. -What's that?
translation.zh: -勃勒-那是什么？

translation.en: The salon has been renamed Borough.
translation.zh: 这个沙龙已经改名为勃勒了

translation.en: It is our first location outside of New York.
translation.zh: 这是我们在纽约以外的第一家店

translation.en: That is so great.
translation.zh: 简直是太棒了

translation.en: What a fun day full of extreme changes.
translation.zh: 多么有趣又充满极端的变化的一天啊

translation.en: Now, if you'll excuse me for a sec, I'm gonna hit the head.
translation.zh: 现在如果你们不介意 我要去厕所了

translation.en: -Give me the keys, motherfucker. -Please don't kill me! Take everything!
translation.zh: --把钥匙给我 混蛋-请别杀了我！ 全都拿走！这是我的手机、我的钱包

translation.en: Here's my phone. Here's my wallet!
translation.zh: 全都拿走！这是我的手机、我的钱包

translation.en: -My PIN number's eight, four-- -[laughing]
translation.zh: 我的密码是84…

translation.en: Jesus, Diane. I do not like that.
translation.zh: 天啊 黛安 我不喜欢那样

translation.en: That's the risk you take coming into the big city, Mark.
translation.zh: 这就是你到大城市来要冒的风险 马克

translation.en: -[laughs] She got you, Dad. -There's the birthday boy!
translation.zh: 她骗到你了 爸爸 这就是生日男孩！

translation.en: Oh, I got you a present.
translation.zh: 我给你买了礼物

translation.en: Tip it back. His boxers come off so you can see what Dave's packin'--
translation.zh: 提示 他的四角裤掉了这样你就能看到戴夫的…

translation.en: Diane, he's 18.
translation.zh: 黛安 他才18岁

translation.en: -I know. He can legally drink. -That's not--
translation.zh: -我知道 他可以合法喝酒了-那不是…

translation.en: This is actually apropos, Aunt Diane.
translation.zh: 这确实很相关 黛安阿姨

translation.en: We're going to the Art Institute to see Hannah Black's video installation.
translation.zh: 我们要去艺术学院看汉娜·布莱克的录像装置

translation.en: It's a reimagining of all the Renaissance Masters.
translation.zh: 这是对所有文艺复兴大师的重新想象

translation.en: But first, lunch at the Palmer House.
translation.zh: 但首先要去帕尔默酒店吃午餐

translation.en: [verbalizing foghorn] Sucks.
translation.zh: 糟透了

translation.en: Speakin' of which, where's my sister?
translation.zh: 说到这个 我妹妹呢？

translation.en: Oh, um, she's-- Uh--
translation.zh: 她…

translation.en: Well, what's goin' on with you, Diane?
translation.zh: 你最近过得怎么样 黛安？

translation.en: Your hair looks… consistent.
translation.zh: 你头发看起来…始终如一

translation.en: Mark, I know when you're hiding something 'cause your milky skin gets pink.
translation.zh: 马克 我知道你在隐瞒什么因为你乳白色的皮肤会变红

translation.en: -Okay, she's upstairs. -Mwah!
translation.zh: 好吧 她在楼上

translation.en: Well, if it isn't the Wicked Witch of the North Shore.
translation.zh: 这不是北岸的坏女巫吗

translation.en: To what do I owe the pleasure?
translation.zh: 什么风把你吹来了？

translation.en: We'll be in touch.
translation.zh: 我们保持联系

translation.en: If you're thinkin' about rentin' out the second room, Bonnie,
translation.zh: 如果你想把第二个房间租出去

translation.en: you gotta tell me. I keep my wet clothes in there.
translation.zh: 你需要告诉我我都把湿衣服放在里面

translation.en: She's not moving in.
translation.zh: 她不会搬进来的

translation.en: She stages apartments.
translation.zh: 她负责公寓管理

translation.en: Diane, look, you know Daniel got into Stanford, right?
translation.zh: 黛安 听着你知道丹尼尔进了斯坦福吧？

translation.en: I know. And I hope my recommendation letter helped.
translation.zh: 我知道 希望我的推荐信能有所帮助

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Besides being one of the most elite universities in the world,
translation.zh: 除了是世界上最顶尖的大学之一

translation.en: it's also incredibly expensive.
translation.zh: 那里学费也非常昂贵

translation.en: So Mark and I have to offload some of our assets.
translation.zh: 所以马克和我必须要卖掉一些资产

translation.en: English, please.
translation.zh: 请说英语

translation.en: Oh my God, I'm selling the condo.
translation.zh: 天啊 我要把公寓卖了

translation.en: So I'm gonna have a new landlord?
translation.zh: 那我要有个新房东了吗？

translation.en: You have to move out, Diane.
translation.zh: 你必须要搬出去 黛安

translation.en: [gasps] What? How could you do this to me?
translation.zh: 什么？你怎么能这样对我？

translation.en: After all the work I put into this place?
translation.zh: 在我为这里付出了那么多之后？

translation.en: The Van Halen Fatheads,
translation.zh: 范·海伦定制壁纸

translation.en: that poster of the Fridge on the fridge…
translation.zh: 冰箱橄榄球小子的海报 在冰箱上… （72号 “冰箱”）

translation.en: Maybe this'll be good for you.
translation.zh: 也许这对你有好处

translation.en: It could be the kick in the pants you need.
translation.zh: 这可能是你需要的鞭策

translation.en: What the hell does that mean?
translation.zh: 这到底是什么意思？

translation.en: I mean, don't you think it's time for you to reevaluate?
translation.zh: 我是说 你不觉得是时候重新评估一下自己了吗？

translation.en: Wait, where is the dishwasher?
translation.zh: 等等 洗碗机去哪儿了？

translation.en: I upgraded it to a kegerator.
translation.zh: 我把它升级成了啤酒机

translation.en: -[phone chimes] -Oh. I can't get into this right now.
translation.zh: 我现在不能谈这个了

translation.en: A homeless person just walked past the car, and Mark is nervous.
translation.zh: 一个无家可归的人刚从车旁走过马克很紧张

translation.en: A homeless person?
translation.zh: 无家可归的人？

translation.en: You mean, like what you just made me?
translation.zh: 你是说 就像你刚刚让我变成的那样？

translation.en: You have one week.
translation.zh: 你有一周的时间

translation.en: Oh, that's plenty of time.
translation.zh: 那时间挺多的

translation.en: I've gotten pregnant and un-pregnant in one week!
translation.zh: 我在一周内可以怀孕之后再打掉！

translation.en: I am just fine, baby!
translation.zh: 我没事 宝贝！

translation.en: [Diane] So Kurt's gone, job is rocky,
translation.zh: 所以库尔特离开了 工作也不稳定

translation.en: and the apartment situation ain't lookin' good.
translation.zh: 公寓的情况看起来不太好

translation.en: That's a three-peat but in a bad way.
translation.zh: 这是三连冠 不过是不好的那种

translation.en: Luckily, I can always count on my baby boy, Mikey.
translation.zh: 幸运的是我总能指望我的宝贝儿子 麦奇

translation.en: Hi, Mikey!
translation.zh: 嗨 麦奇！

translation.en: Most mothers would be horrified if their son just got hit in the face
translation.zh: 大多数母亲 当她们的儿子 被21公斤的新秀丽行李箱砸中脸时都会很害怕

translation.en: with a 48-pound Samsonite,
translation.zh: 被21公斤的新秀丽行李箱砸中脸时都会很害怕

translation.en: but my Mikey has the skull of a ram.
translation.zh: 但我的麦奇有公羊一样的骨骼

translation.en: He's been hit in the head at every single Chicago sporting event.
translation.zh: 他在芝加哥的每一场体育赛事中头部都被击中过

translation.en: That huge, hard melon is why he's my only kid.
translation.zh: 所以那个又大又硬的人是我唯一的孩子

translation.en: Tore me apart comin' out.
translation.zh: 生出来的时候差点儿把我撕碎

translation.en: -[grunts] -Hi, baby. I brought you rib tips.
translation.zh: 嗨 宝贝 我给你带了肋排

translation.en: Ma, I'm super busy.
translation.zh: 妈妈 我超级忙

translation.en: Southwest keeps addin' these "wanna get aways,"
translation.zh: 西南航空保留着这些“特价机票”

translation.en: and all the bags fly free.
translation.zh: 所有的行李都免费

translation.en: You know what would help? If I moved in with you for a bit.
translation.zh: 你知道怎么做会有帮助吗？如果我搬去和你住一段时间

translation.en: I could cook you breakfast gyros.
translation.zh: 我可以给你做烤肉早餐

translation.en: I'm sorry, Ma.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉 妈妈

translation.en: Dad already took the Murphy bed in the garage.
translation.zh: 爸爸已经拿走车库的折叠床了

translation.en: That slippery motherfucker.
translation.zh: 那个狡猾的混蛋

translation.en: I can't believe he would stoop to askin' his own child to bail him out.
translation.zh: 我真不敢相信他会屈尊让自己的孩子来解救他

translation.en: What about the shed in back?
translation.zh: 后面的小屋怎么样？

translation.en: I would never let my mother live in a frickin' shed.
translation.zh: 我绝不会让我妈住在破棚子里

translation.en: Besides, my buddy Anton's living there until his wife gets out of jail.
translation.zh: 再说了 我朋友安东在他妻子出狱前都住在那里

translation.en: You know what? You're right. I'm better than a shed.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？你说得对我可比棚子好多了

translation.en: I should upgrade a little.
translation.zh: 我应该升级一下

translation.en: I love you, honey.
translation.zh: 我爱你 宝贝

translation.en: And remember, always lift with your back.
translation.zh: 记住 永远挺直你的后背

translation.en: [grunts] Goddamn it! That is for sure over 50 pounds.
translation.zh: 靠！这肯定超过22公斤了

translation.en: So I'd like somewhere with a pool. Above ground is preferred.
translation.zh: 所以我想要一个有游泳池的地方最好是在地面上的

translation.en: And I need a three-car garage
translation.zh: 我需要能停放三辆车的车库

translation.en: 'cause I gotta park my Camaro horizontally.
translation.zh: 因为我要水平停放我的科迈罗

translation.en: Okay, that's a lot of amenities.
translation.zh: 好吧 这是很多便利设施

translation.en: -[laptop chimes] -Oh, your credit report just came in.
translation.zh: 你的信用报告刚收到

translation.en: -I don't think I can help you. -Why? What is it?
translation.zh: -我想我帮不了你-为什么？怎么了？

translation.en: Negative 70.
translation.zh: 信用负70分

translation.en: Ah! It went up.
translation.zh: 分数上涨了

translation.en: Maybe we need to reassess your criteria.
translation.zh: 也许我们需要重新评估你的标准

translation.en: That's fine. I'm super flex.
translation.zh: 没关系 我比较随和

translation.en: If it's an in-ground pool, I'll deal.
translation.zh: 如果是地下游泳池 我也可以接受

translation.en: I gotta run to work. I believe in you…
translation.zh: 我必须要跑去上班了 我相信你…

translation.en: -Carl. -Carl.
translation.zh: -卡尔-卡尔

translation.en: The cut looks great, honey.
translation.zh: 这个发型看起来很好 亲爱的

translation.en: Very Dennis Franz.
translation.zh: 非常有丹尼斯·弗朗茨的范

translation.en: That'll be… 36 dollars?
translation.zh: 一共是…36美元？

translation.en: Jesus, what a rip!
translation.zh: 天啊 这么贵！

translation.en: But totally worth it.
translation.zh: 但完全值得

translation.en: Do you take Apple Pay?
translation.zh: 这里可以用苹果支付吗？

translation.en: [laughs] Yeah, sure. One bushel of apples ought to do it.
translation.zh: 当然可以 一蒲式耳苹果就够了

translation.en: Seriously, just scan my phone.
translation.zh: 认真点 扫我的手机就好

translation.en: Ah, shit. Let me figure out this goddamn nerd pad.
translation.zh: 靠 让我弄一下这个该死的笨平板

translation.en: -Oops. Wrong button. Maybe this-- -[thrash metal playing]
translation.zh: 按错键了 也许是这个…

translation.en: Okay, now that we've sanitized the perineum,
translation.zh: 好吧 现在我们已经消毒了会阴

translation.en: let's remove this ingrown hair.
translation.zh: 让我们把这些内生的毛发去掉

translation.en: Diane, turn this off.
translation.zh: 黛安 把这个关掉

translation.en: -Shit. Sorry. Hold on. -[thrash metal cycles on and off]
translation.zh: 靠 抱歉 稍等

translation.en: And why are you watchin' this at work?
translation.zh: 你上班的时候为什么看这个？

translation.en: You said I couldn't watch the Cubs.
translation.zh: 你说我不能看熊队的比赛

translation.en: Turn it off, now.
translation.zh: 马上关掉

translation.en: Got it. So you hit "off."
translation.zh: 知道了 所以你点击“关”

translation.en: Diane, you haven't had a client in your chair for two days,
translation.zh: 黛安 你已经两天没有客户了

translation.en: so I put you at the front counter, and somehow, that was worse.
translation.zh: 所以我把你安排在前台 结果更糟

translation.en: So back to the chair?
translation.zh: 那就回到原来剪发的位置？

translation.en: Diane, to be honest, I don't know where I can put you.
translation.zh: 黛安 说实话我不知道应该把你安排在哪儿

translation.en: Maybe you just don't fit in here.
translation.zh: 也许你就不适合这里

translation.en: Oh, I see what's goin' on.
translation.zh: 我明白你的意思了

translation.en: Well, that's too bad.
translation.zh: 好吧 这太糟糕了

translation.en: 'Cause I really wanted to fit in here at Borough
translation.zh: 因为我真的很想融入勃勒

translation.en: 'cause this place rocks.
translation.zh: 因为这里真的很棒

translation.en: Psych.
translation.zh: 神经病

translation.en: [Diane] Now, when a white person tells you they're from Chicago,
translation.zh: 现在 当一个白人告诉你他们来自芝加哥

translation.en: they're actually most likely from a suburb,
translation.zh: 他们很可能来自郊区

translation.en: like where my sister Bonnie lives.
translation.zh: 比如我妹妹邦妮住的地方

translation.en: Hey. I'm talking to my Stanford roommate. Mom's in the kitchen.
translation.zh: 嗨 我在和我斯坦福的室友说话妈妈在厨房

translation.en: Here, sweetie, kill this for me.
translation.zh: 给 宝贝 帮我把烟灭了

translation.en: Oh, I don't want this.
translation.zh: 我不想要这个

translation.en: Hi. Place looks great. Love the curtains and shit.
translation.zh: 嗨 这地方看起来很棒我很喜欢那些窗帘之类的

translation.en: Listen, I gotta talk to you, in private.
translation.zh: 听着 我要跟你单独谈谈

translation.en: Anything you say to me, you can say in front of Mark.
translation.zh: 你跟我说的任何话都可以当着马克的面说

translation.en: Okay. Hey, I can't stop queefing.
translation.zh: 好吧 喂 我阴道一直出气

translation.en: I'm gonna go charge the leaf blower.
translation.zh: 我去给吹叶机充电

translation.en: Anyhooters, whaddya think about giving me an extension on the apartment?
translation.zh: 不管怎样 你觉得延期租我的公寓怎么样？

translation.en: Two, maybe three years.
translation.zh: 两年 也许三年时间

translation.en: Gotta get my freakin' ducks in a barrel.
translation.zh: 我必须把自己的事情安排好

translation.en: Absolutely not.
translation.zh: 当然不行

translation.en: [sighs] I thought it might come to this.
translation.zh: 我就知道会变成这样

translation.en: This is an Uno's Pizzeria platinum gold card.
translation.zh: 这是一张优诺披萨店的白金金卡

translation.en: It entitles the cardholder to free unlimited deep dish pizza for life.
translation.zh: 持卡人可以终身免费享用无限深盘披萨

translation.en: I won it in a thong contest on Mancow's Morning Madhouse.
translation.zh: 我在《人牛的疯狂早上》中丁字裤比赛里赢的

translation.en: Obviously, the value of the card far exceeds the price of the rent,
translation.zh: 显然 这张卡的价值远远超过了租金

translation.en: so we're gonna have to prorate the difference.
translation.zh: 所以我们要将差值按比例分配

translation.en: Wow, what a reasonable trade-off.
translation.zh: 哇 多么合理的交易啊

translation.en: I rescind my offer.
translation.zh: 我撤销我的提议

translation.en: Actually, while you're here, I do need you to sign this.
translation.zh: 事实上 既然你来了我需要你签一下这个

translation.en: It just says that you will vacate the condo on the agreed-upon date.
translation.zh: 上面只说你要在约定的日期搬出公寓

translation.en: Feel free to have your lawyer look it over.
translation.zh: 你可以随意让你的律师来查看

translation.en: Oh, sure. Yeah, I'll just run it by my lawyer.
translation.zh: 当然 好 我去找我的律师处理这个

translation.en: And my stockbroker and my dentist.
translation.zh: 还有我的股票经纪人和牙医

translation.en: Come on, Bonnie, you know I can't afford those luxuries.
translation.zh: 拜托 邦妮你知道我买不起那些奢侈品

translation.en: Not everyone married a trust-fund baby.
translation.zh: 不是每个人都娶了信托基金的孩子

translation.en: Stop saying everyone who has a steady job is a trust-fund baby.
translation.zh: 别再说每个有稳定工作的人都是信托基金的宝贝了

translation.en: I'm not signing your stupid papers.
translation.zh: 我才不签你的破文件

translation.en: And to think, I almost gave you free deep dish for life.
translation.zh: 想想看 我差点给你一辈子免费的深盘披萨

translation.en: Unlimited toppings, up to three. No premium meats.
translation.zh: 配料不限 最多三种 没有优质肉类

translation.en: Not available on weekend nights. Void where prohibited--
translation.zh: 周末晚上不可使用法律禁止的地方无效…

translation.en: Diane, go home.
translation.zh: 黛安 回家去

translation.en: You hungry, kiddo?
translation.zh: 你饿了吗 孩子？

translation.en: My roommate's name is Thorn.
translation.zh: 我的室友叫索恩

translation.en: He's on a water polo scholarship,
translation.zh: 他拿了水球奖学金

translation.en: and he says his girlfriend will be sleeping over a lot.
translation.zh: 他还说他女朋友会在他家过夜

translation.en: I shouldn't complain.
translation.zh: 我不应该抱怨

translation.en: Stanford is one of the elite universities in the world.
translation.zh: 斯坦福大学是世界顶尖大学之一

translation.en: You sound like your frickin' mom.
translation.zh: 你听起来像你妈妈

translation.en: What are you really feeling?
translation.zh: 你的真实感受是什么？

translation.en: Okay, I'll go first.
translation.zh: 好吧 我先来说

translation.en: I know when you look at me, you think, "Damn, my aunt's got her shit together."
translation.zh: 我知道当你看着我的时候你会想“靠 我阿姨一切都还井井有序”

translation.en: But if I'm being honest,
translation.zh: 但如果我说实话

translation.en: I'm kind of in a rebuilding year, and I don't know what's next for me.
translation.zh: 我现在是重建的一年我不知道接下来会发生什么

translation.en: Now, you go.
translation.zh: 现在 该你说了

translation.en: [sighs] Well, I think I got so caught up in everybody wanting me to go to Stanford,
translation.zh: 我觉得我被困在了每个人都想让我去斯坦福的想法里

translation.en: I never asked myself if I wanted to go there.
translation.zh: 我从未问过自己是否想去那里

translation.en: I felt the same way
translation.zh: 我参加中世纪主题

translation.en: when I went to Medieval Times for my third bachelorette party.
translation.zh: 第三次单身派对时 也有同样的感觉

translation.en: Did you know all that shit's fake?
translation.zh: 你知道那些都是假的吗？

translation.en: Yeah, we kept telling you.
translation.zh: 是啊 我们一直在跟你说

translation.en: [sighs] Why am I gonna move 2,000 miles away to find myself,
translation.zh: 为什么我要搬到3218公里以外的地方去寻找自我

translation.en: when I don't even know who I am here?
translation.zh: 而我自己都不知道我是谁？

translation.en: I know who you are. You're my amazing nephew.
translation.zh: 我知道你是谁 你是我厉害的侄子

translation.en: You're cool and kind and talented. Hello!
translation.zh: 你很酷、很善良、很有才华 真的！

translation.en: With all your art stuff?
translation.zh: 还有你所有的艺术作品？

translation.en: You're gonna be aces no matter where you end up.
translation.zh: 无论你到哪儿 你都会做得很优秀

translation.en: You really like my artwork?
translation.zh: 你真的喜欢我的艺术作品吗？

translation.en: It's incredible, Daniel.
translation.zh: 非常不可思议 丹尼尔

translation.en: And I think art sucks.
translation.zh: 我觉得艺术糟透了

translation.en: -[jaunty ring tone plays] -Oh, it's my Realtor. Go for Diane.
translation.zh: 是我的房产经纪人 我是黛安

translation.en: Hello, Diane, great news.
translation.zh: 喂 黛安 有个好消息

translation.en: Found a place, and it's in your price range.
translation.zh: 找到了一个地方也在你的价格范围内

translation.en: Sweet Ditka's dick.
translation.zh: 太棒了

translation.en: See, Daniel? Things do work out.
translation.zh: 看到了吗 丹尼尔？一切都会变好的

translation.en: What neighborhood is it in?
translation.zh: 房子在哪个社区？

translation.en: Pilsen? Back of the Yards? Uptown? Downtown?
translation.zh: 皮尔森？后花园？郊区？市中心？

translation.en: Logan Square? Lincoln Square?
translation.zh: 洛根广场？林肯广场？

translation.en: Lincoln Park? Garfield Park?
translation.zh: 林肯公园？加菲尔德公园？

translation.en: Morgan Park? Hyde Park? Would love a park.
translation.zh: 摩根公园？海德公园？我觉得公园不错

translation.en: It's in Hammond.
translation.zh: 在哈蒙德

translation.en: Hammond? But that's in…
translation.zh: 哈蒙德？但那是在…

translation.en: [low-pitched and distorted] Indiana.
translation.zh: 印第安纳州

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不要！

translation.en: Maybe Indiana isn't that bad.
translation.zh: 也许印第安纳州没那么糟

translation.en: Are you kiddin' me?
translation.zh: 你在逗我吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna move to that shithole and become one of those invisible women
translation.zh: 我要搬到那个破地方去变成每天晚上一个人吃

translation.en: who eat Stouffer's creamed spinach soufflé by herself every night,
translation.zh: 斯托弗薄饼、菠菜蛋奶酥的隐形女人

translation.en: until one day her cats turn on her and boom! I'm frickin' dead.
translation.zh: 直到有一天她的猫背叛了她然后嘣的一声 我就死了

translation.en: And I'll never see you again because I'll be stuck in California
translation.zh: 我也不会再见到你了因为我会被困在加州

translation.en: listening to Thorn not satisfying his girlfriend.
translation.zh: 听索恩说他满足不了自己的女朋友

translation.en: You know what?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？

translation.en: You're leavin'. I'm leavin'. Fuck it.
translation.zh: 你要走了 我也要走了…

translation.en: Let's have the rager to end all ragers.
translation.zh: 靠 让我们用疯狂的派对来结束所有派对吧

translation.en: One last chance for us to jam out with our clams out.
translation.zh: 这是我们最后的机会了

translation.en: Yeah, I don't see how clam-jamming would fix this.
translation.zh: 是的 我看不出"僚机"能解决什么问题

translation.en: It won't. This world is filled with shit that we can't control.
translation.zh: 不会的 这个世界充满了我们无法控制的东西

translation.en: Your husband leaves, you get a jagbag of a boss,
translation.zh: 你丈夫走了 你还有个讨厌的老板

translation.en: your whore sister kicks you out.
translation.zh: 你的婊子妹妹把你赶了出去…

translation.en: -Please don't call my mother that. -Daniel, it's like I always say.
translation.zh: -请不要那样叫我妈妈-丹尼尔 就像我常说的

translation.en: When life gives you lemons,
translation.zh: 当生活给你酸苦的柠檬时

translation.en: you turn that shit into Mike's Hard Lemonade.
translation.zh: 你就要将其变为“迈克硬柠檬水”

translation.en: [singer] Whoo!
translation.zh: （来黛安的大派对 疯狂派对会很棒）

translation.en: Thanks for comin', sweetie.
translation.zh: 谢谢你来 亲爱的

translation.en: Ooh, I'll take a hit of that.
translation.zh: 我来尝一口

translation.en: Fuck Green Bay!
translation.zh: 去他妈的绿湾队！

translation.en: Bottoms up.
translation.zh: 干杯

translation.en: [inhales] My girls!
translation.zh: 我的姑娘们！

translation.en: God bless you two. I'm gonna miss you both so much.
translation.zh: 上帝保佑你们俩 我会想念你们的

translation.en: It won't be the same without you.
translation.zh: 没有你 一切都不一样了

translation.en: It'll be less loud, less smoky, and less fun.
translation.zh: 不会有那么吵闹 那么多烟也没有那么多快乐了

translation.en: [laughs] You said it.
translation.zh: 说的没错

translation.en: Scottie Pippen. Ya made it.
translation.zh: 斯科特·皮蓬 你来了

translation.en: You told me the other Bulls would be here.
translation.zh: 你告诉我 其他的公牛队队员会来的

translation.en: I did. I did say that.
translation.zh: 确实 我确实这么说了

translation.en: Find me later. I'm single again.
translation.zh: 一会儿找我 我现在又单身了

translation.en: We can play "Just the Tip in with Pippen."
translation.zh: 我们可以玩“和皮蓬一起轻托入篮”

translation.en: I know, right?
translation.zh: 我知道 对吧？

translation.en: There he is. My handsome nephew.
translation.zh: 他在那儿 我帅气的侄子

translation.en: What I wouldn't give to be 18 again and living down in the city.
translation.zh: 如果我能回到18岁住在城市里 我愿付出一切

translation.en: Well, actually, I'm going to coll--
translation.zh: 事实上 我要去…

translation.en: Whoa-whoa-whoa, Styx. Hold up, boys.
translation.zh: 哇 冥河 等一下 各位

translation.en: Can I get everyone's attention?
translation.zh: 大家能听我说一下吗？

translation.en: Tonight, we are celebratin' the end of an era.
translation.zh: 今晚我们要庆祝一个时代的结束

translation.en: As some of you may know,
translation.zh: 你们有些人可能知道

translation.en: this'll be the last rager thrown at this address.
translation.zh: 这将是这里最后一次狂欢了

translation.en: -What? -No way.
translation.zh: -什么？-不是吧

translation.en: Where are the other Bulls?
translation.zh: 其他公牛队队员在哪儿？

translation.en: But more importantly,
translation.zh: 但更重要的是

translation.en: we are also here to celebrate the start of a new era.
translation.zh: 我们在这里也庆祝一个新时代的开始

translation.en: I'd like to give a toast to my nephew.
translation.zh: 我想敬我的侄子一杯

translation.en: Daniel Whiddington, get your juicy little fanny up here.
translation.zh: 丹尼尔·惠廷顿快挪动你肥美的小屁股 站到台上来

translation.en: This is the best night of my life!
translation.zh: 这是我这辈子最棒的一晚！

translation.en: It's a miracle he turned out so good,
translation.zh: 他能变的这么好真是个奇迹

translation.en: 'cause his dad is a pussy and his mom is a dick.
translation.zh: 因为他爸爸很娘 他妈妈是个混蛋

translation.en: What da fuck?
translation.zh: 什么情况？

translation.en: -Mom? -Bonnie?
translation.zh: -妈妈？-邦妮？

translation.en: Put that goddamn beer stein down.
translation.zh: 把那该死的啤酒杯放下

translation.en: Oh, no, her Chicago accent's out.
translation.zh: 糟糕 她的芝加哥口音出来了

translation.en: -Did you tell her about the party? -No.
translation.zh: -你告诉她派对的事了吗？-没有

translation.en: I tracked his phone, and I saw he was here.
translation.zh: 我追踪了他的手机然后看到他在这里

translation.en: That's an invasion of my privacy.
translation.zh: 这是在侵犯我的隐私

translation.en: You, get your things.
translation.zh: 你 去拿你的东西

translation.en: You, fire escape, now.
translation.zh: 你 现在到安全出口

translation.en: Everything's okay.
translation.zh: 一切都好

translation.en: Party's still on.
translation.zh: 派对继续

translation.en: Styx, play "Come Sail Away."
translation.zh: 冥河 演奏一首《来远航》

translation.en: Listen, Bonnie--
translation.zh: 听着 邦妮…

translation.en: I should call the cops on you for getting my underage son drunk.
translation.zh: 我应该报警说你把我未成年的儿子灌醉了

translation.en: The cops? Who do you think brought the nitrous?
translation.zh: 报警？你觉得笑气是谁带来的？

translation.en: Look at you.
translation.zh: 看看你

translation.en: You're chasing a party that ended 20 years ago.
translation.zh: 你在追一个20年前就结束了的派对

translation.en: Why do you think Mom and Dad moved to Arizona?
translation.zh: 你觉得爸爸妈妈为什么搬去亚利桑那州？

translation.en: Because the dry air is good for Dad's gout.
translation.zh: 因为干燥的空气对爸爸的痛风有好处

translation.en: No, it was to get away from you.
translation.zh: 不是 是为了远离你

translation.en: You're just like Chicago,
translation.zh: 你就像芝加哥一样

translation.en: a huge mess whose best days are behind you.
translation.zh: 一个最好的日子已经过去的烂摊子

translation.en: I am just like Chicago!
translation.zh: 我就像芝加哥！

translation.en: Yeah, we ain't perfect.
translation.zh: 是的 我们都不完美

translation.en: The South Side is very screwed up.
translation.zh: 南区一团糟

translation.en: North Side, a little better.
translation.zh: 北区还好一点

translation.en: A lot of work and money has been put into it. That makes sense.
translation.zh: 我们为此投入了大量的工作和金钱这是有意义的

translation.en: At least I don't worry about what everyone thinks
translation.zh: 至少我不担心别人怎么想

translation.en: and pretend to be somethin' I'm not,
translation.zh: 不用假装成我不是的样子

translation.en: which is exactly what you're doin' to Daniel.
translation.zh: 这就是你对丹尼尔所做的

translation.en: Well, guess what? He's goin' to college.
translation.zh: 你猜怎么着？他要上大学了

translation.en: So worry about your own degenerate ass.
translation.zh: 所以你还是担心你自己吧

translation.en: Don't talk to her like that way.
translation.zh: 别那样跟她说话

translation.en: Daniel, you're drunk. Go downstairs and get in the car.
translation.zh: 丹尼尔 你喝醉了 下楼到车里去

translation.en: You're not the boss of me anymore.
translation.zh: 你不再是我的老板了

translation.en: Get in the goddamn car.
translation.zh: 快去车上

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Nine a.m. tomorrow, you're out.
translation.zh: 明天早上九点 你就要搬出去

translation.en: And clean this fucking place up.
translation.zh: 还有 把这地方收拾干净

translation.en: Daniel, you okay?
translation.zh: 丹尼尔 你还好吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不好

translation.en: Is this how Aunt Diane feels every morning?
translation.zh: 黛安阿姨每天早上都是这种感觉吗？

translation.en: Yes, it is. And it's very sad.
translation.zh: 是的 这种感觉很难过

translation.en: Ugh. This is all because of her.
translation.zh: 这一切都是因为她

translation.en: It is because of her.
translation.zh: 都是因为她

translation.en: Mom, we need to talk…
translation.zh: 妈妈 我们需要谈谈…

translation.en: …in ten minutes.
translation.zh: 十分钟后谈谈

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: I put the dishwasher back in.
translation.zh: 我把洗碗机放回去了

translation.en: [Bonnie] I see.
translation.zh: 我看到了

translation.en: It's upside down, but I appreciate the effort.
translation.zh: 方向颠倒了 但我很感激你的努力

translation.en: I signed those forms you asked for.
translation.zh: 你要的那些表格我都签了

translation.en: Oh, you didn't sign it Tits McGee.
translation.zh: 你没有用什么咪咪麦吉签上去

translation.en: Nah, I used my real name.
translation.zh: 没有 我用真名签的

translation.en: You were right, Bon. I need to reevaluate.
translation.zh: 你说得对 邦 我需要重新评估

translation.en: Anyhoo, Indiana's a short drive--
translation.zh: 不管怎样 印第安纳州开车很近…

translation.en: Diane, stop.
translation.zh: 黛安 别说了

translation.en: I don't know what happened here last night,
translation.zh: 我不知道昨晚这里发生了什么

translation.en: but Daniel has decided he doesn't want to go to Stanford at this time.
translation.zh: 但丹尼尔决定了他这一次不想去斯坦福了

translation.en: Oh shit. You must be so pissed.
translation.zh: 靠 你一定很生气

translation.en: I am.
translation.zh: 确实

translation.en: I-- I was. But I thought about it,
translation.zh: 我之前很生气 但我想了想

translation.en: and I've never seen him so happy and confident.
translation.zh: 我从没见过他这么开心、这么自信

translation.en: And hungover.
translation.zh: 也没见过他宿醉

translation.en: But as Brené Brown says, when your child is happy, you need to support them.
translation.zh: 但正如布琳·布朗说的当你孩子开心时 你需要支持他们

translation.en: Tits up, tits out. What are you gonna do?
translation.zh: 真是可喜可贺 你打算怎么做？

translation.en: I'll tell you what you're gonna do. You're gonna let him live here with you
translation.zh: 我来告诉你该怎么做你要让他和你住在一起

translation.en: while he takes a year to figure things out.
translation.zh: 他要花一年时间来理清头绪

translation.en: Whatever that means.
translation.zh: 无论那意味着什么

translation.en: Go scratch. Does that mean--
translation.zh: 太棒了 这意味着…？

translation.en: We're not selling the place. Yet.
translation.zh: 我们不卖这个地方了 目前不卖

translation.en: Whassup?
translation.zh: 你好吗？

translation.en: -Whassup? -Whassup?
translation.zh: -你好吗？-你好吗？

translation.en: Whassup?
translation.zh: 你好吗？

translation.en: -Whassup? -Whassup?
translation.zh: -你好吗？-你好吗？

translation.en: Stop! Daniel, you don't even know what that's from.
translation.zh: 停下来！丹尼尔你都不知道那是从哪儿来的

translation.en: Let's celebrate. First round on me!
translation.zh: 我们来庆祝吧 第一轮我请！

translation.en: Oh shit, I don't have a job.
translation.zh: 靠 我没有工作

translation.en: Actually, I might have an idea.
translation.zh: 事实上 我也许有个主意

translation.en: She's back.
translation.zh: 她回来了

translation.en: Did you come back here to pick up the beer bong you left behind?
translation.zh: 你是来拿你落下的啤酒壶的吗？

translation.en: Nope, I came in to cut hair.
translation.zh: 不是 我是来剪头发的

translation.en: Turns out a party invite is a great way to make a client list.
translation.zh: 原来派对邀请是制作客户名单的好方法

translation.en: Whaddya think, Gideon?
translation.zh: 你觉得呢 吉迪恩？

translation.en: Chair three.
translation.zh: 三号椅子

translation.en: -[thrash metal playing] -Oh, my bad!
translation.zh: 天啊 我的错！
